channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric SE -- PowerSuite 2, All released versions (VW3A8104 & Patches)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric SE -- PowerSuite 2, All released versions (VW3A8104 & Patches)

item.title: CVE-2018-7796|2024-08-05T06:37:59.566Z -- schneider%20electric%20se -- powersuite%202%2C%20all%20released%20versions%20%28vw3a8104%20%26%20patches%29
item.description: A Buffer Error vulnerability exists in PowerSuite 2, all released versions (VW3A8104 & Patches), which could cause an overflow in the memcpy function, leading to corruption of data and program instability.
